title: Unlocked: Ashyre's Story
description: Discover a world where differences reign and love conquers all.... In Lynaria, life is serene, ordered, and unemotional. In Dareknay, it is boisterous, spirited, and free. In Pitan, it is something to be survived.... A princess must wed a barbarian in order to save her people from extinction. There is only one quandary, she never makes it to his castle. Taken by a perverse and sadistic people, Navali struggles to survive. Her one hope lies with the prince she was being forced to wed. Prince Ashyre races to rescue his bride before the unmentionable occurs. Will he be in time? And if he is, will they make it out of Pitan alive?...
author: Alexa E. Woodiwiss
